attacks.name: Tail Revenge
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage times the number of Magikarp in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Wreak Havoc
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard the top card from your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Dragon Beat
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card from each of your opponent's Pok√©mon.
